words.translation: Ta Seen|These|(are the) Verses|(of) the Quran|and a Book|clear

translations.1: Taa-Seeen; tilka Aayaatul Qur-aani Wa-Kitaabim Mubeen

words.translation: A guidance|and glad tidings|for the believers

translations.1: Hudanw Wa-bushraa lil-mu'mineen

words.translation: Those who|establish|the prayer|and give|zakah|and they|in the Hereafter|[they]|believe with certainty

translations.1: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

words.translation: Indeed|those who|(do) not|believe|in the Hereafter|We have made fair-seeming|to them|their deeds|so they|wander blindly

translations.1: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati zaiyannaa lahum a'maalahum fahum ya'mahoon

words.translation: Those|(are) the ones|for them|(is) an evil|[the] punishment|and they|in|the Hereafter|[they]|(will be) the greatest losers

translations.1: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena lahum sooo'ul 'azaabi Wa-hum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon

words.translation: And indeed, you|surely, receive|the Quran|from [near]|from [near]|the All-Wise|the All-Knower

translations.1: Wa-innaka latulaqqal Qur-aana mil ladun Hakeemin 'Aleem

words.translation: When|said|Musa|to his family|Indeed I|perceive|a fire|I will bring you|from it|some information|or|I will bring you|a torch|burning|so that you may|warm yourselves

translations.1: Iz qaala Moosaa li-ahliheee inneee aanastu naaran saaateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw aateekum bishihaabin qabasil la'allakum tastaloon

words.translation: But when|he came to it|he was called|[that]|Blessed is|who|(is) at|the fire|and whoever|(is) around it|And glory be|(to) Allah|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'ahaa noodiya am boorika man fin naari Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'aalameen

words.translation: O Musa!|Indeed|I Am|Allah|the All-Mighty|the All-Wise

translations.1: Yaa-Moosaaa innahooo Anal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

words.translation: And Throw|your staff|But when|he saw it|moving|as if it|(were) a snake|he turned back|(in) flight|and (did) not|look back|O Musa!|(Do) not|fear|Indeed [I]|(do) not|fear|(in) My presence|the Messengers

translations.1: Wa-alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal mursaloon

words.translation: Except|who|wrongs|then|substitutes|good|after|evil|then indeed I Am|Oft-Forgiving|Most Merciful

translations.1: Illaa man zalama summa baddala husnam ba'da sooo'in fa-innee Ghafoorur Raheem

words.translation: And enter|your hand|into|your bosom|it will come forth|white|without|without|harm|(These are) among|nine|signs|to|Firaun|and his people|Indeed, they|are|a people|defiantly disobedient

translations.1: Wa-adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in fee tis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna Wa-qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

words.translation: But when|came to them|Our Signs|visible|they said|This|(is) a magic|manifest

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Aayaatunaa mubsiratan qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen

words.translation: And they rejected|them|though were convinced with them (signs)|themselves|(out of) injustice|and haughtiness|So see|how|was|(the) end|(of) the corrupters

translations.1: Wa-jahadoo bihaa wastaiqanat-haaa anfusuhum zulmanw wa-'uluwwaa; fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen

words.translation: And verily|We gave|Dawood|and Sulaiman|knowledge|and they said|Praise be|to Allah|the One Who|has favored us|over|many|of|His servants|the believers

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Daawooda Wa-sulaimaana 'ilmaa; Wa-qaalal hamdu lil-laahil lazee faddalanaa 'alaa kaseerim min 'ibaadihil mu'mineen

words.translation: And inherited|Sulaiman|Dawood|And he said|O|people!|We have been taught|(the) language|(of) the birds|and we have been given|from|every|thing|Indeed|this|surely it|(is) the favor|evident

translations.1: Wa-warisa Sulaimaanu Daawooda Wa-qaala yaaa-aiyuhan naasu 'ullimnaa mantiqat tairi Wa-ooteenaa min kulli shai'in inna haazaa lahuwal fadlul mubeen

words.translation: And were gathered|for Sulaiman|his hosts|of|jinn|and the men|and the birds|and they|(were) set in rows

translations.1: Wa-hushira Sulaimaana junooduhoo minal jinni wal-insi wattairi fahum yooza'oon

words.translation: Until|when|they came|to|(the) valley|(of) the ants|said|an ant|O|ants|Enter|your dwellings|lest not crush you|lest not crush you|Sulaiman|and his hosts|while they|(do) not|perceive

translations.1: hattaaa izaaa ataw 'alaa waadin namli qaalat namlatuien yaaa-aiyuhan namlud khuloo masaakinakum laa yahtimannakum Sulaimaanu Wa-junooduhoo Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.translation: So he smiled|laughing|at|her speech|and said|My Lord!|Grant me (the) power|that|I may thank You|(for) Your Favor|which|You have bestowed|on me|and on|my parents|and that|I may do|righteous (deeds)|that will please You|And admit me|by Your Mercy|among|Your slaves|righteous

translations.1: Fatabassama daahikam min qawlihaa Wa-qaala Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mata-kal lateee an'amta 'alaiyya Wa-'alaa waalidaiyya Wa-an a'mala saalihan tardaahu Wa-adkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibaadikas saaliheen

words.translation: And he inspected|the birds|and said|Why|Why|not|I see|the hoopoe|or|is he|from|the absent

translations.1: Wa-tafaqqadat taira faqaala maa liya laaa araa al-hudhuda, am kaana minal ghaaa'ibeen

words.translation: I will surely punish him|(with) a punishment|severe|or|I will surely slaughter him|unless|he brings me|a reason|clear

translations.1: La-u'azzibanahoo 'azaaban shadeedan aw la-azbahannahoo aw layaatiyannee bisultaanim mubeen

words.translation: So he stayed|not|long|and he said|I have encompassed|that which|not|you have encompassed|it|and I have come to you|from|Saba|with news|certain

translations.1: Famakasa ghaira ba'eedin faqaala ahattu bimaa lam tuhit bihee Wa-ji'tuka min Sabaim binaba-iny yaqeen

words.translation: Indeed I|found|a woman|ruling them|and she has been given|of|every|thing|and for her|(is) a throne|great

translations.1: Innee wajattum ra-atan tamlikuhum Wa-ootiyat min kulli shai'inw Wa-lahaa 'arshun 'azeem

words.translation: And I found her|and her people|prostrating|to the sun|instead of Allah|instead of Allah|instead of Allah|and has made fair-seeming|to them|the Shaitaan|their deeds|and averted them|from|the Way|so they|(are) not|guided

translations.1: Wajattuhaa Wa-qawmahaa yasjudoona lishshamsi min doonil laahi Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli fahum laa yahtadoon

words.translation: That not|they prostrate|to Allah|the One Who|brings forth|the hidden|in|the heavens|and the earth|and knows|what|you conceal|and what|you declare

translations.1: Allaa yasjudoo lillaahil lazee yukhrijul khab'a fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ya'lamu maa tukhfoona Wa-maa tu'linoon

words.translation: Allah|(there is) no|god|but|He|(the) Lord|(of) the Throne|the Great

translations.1: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem

words.translation: He said|We will see|whether you speak (the) truth|or|you are|of|the liars

translations.1: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen

words.translation: Go|with my letter|this|and deliver it|to them|Then|turn away|from them|and see|what|they return

translations.1: Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa-alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur maazaa yarji'oon

words.translation: She said|O|chiefs!|Indeed [I]|is delivered|to me|a letter|noble

translations.1: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem

words.translation: Indeed it|(is) from|Sulaiman|and indeed it (is)|In the name|(of) Allah|the Most Gracious|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Innahoo min Sulaimaana Wa-innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem

words.translation: That not|exalt yourselves|against me|but come to me|(in) submission."

translations.1: Allaa ta'loo 'alaiya waa-toonee muslimeen

words.translation: She said|O|chiefs!|Advise me|in|my affair|Not|I would be|the one to decide|any matter|until|you are present with me

translations.1: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aftoonee fee amree maa kuntu qaati'atan amran hattaa tashhhaddon

words.translation: They said|We|(are) possessors|(of) strength|and possessors|(of) might|great|and the command|(is) up to you|so look|what|you will command

translations.1: Qaaloo nahnu uloo quwwatinw Wa-uloo baasin shadeed; wal-amru ilaiki fanzuree maazaa taamureen

words.translation: She said|Indeed|the kings|when|they enter|a town|they ruin it|and make|(the) most honorable|(of) its people|(the) lowest|And thus|they do

translations.1: Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa Wa-ja'alooo a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; Wa-kazaalika yaf'aloon

words.translation: But indeed I am|going to send|to them|a gift|and see|with what|return|the messengers

translations.1: Wa-innee mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanaaziratum bima yarji'ul mursaloon

words.translation: So when|came|(to) Sulaiman|he said|Will you provide me|with wealth|But what|Allah has given me|Allah has given me|(is) better|than what|He has given you|Nay|you|in your gift|rejoice

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'a Sulaimaana qaala atumiddoonani bimaalin famaaa aataaniyal laahu khairum mimmmaaa aataakum bal antum bihadiy-yatikum tafrahoon

words.translation: Return|to them|surely we will come to them|with hosts|not|(is) resistance|for them|of it|and surely we will drive them out|from there|(in) humiliation|and they|(will be) abased

translations.1: Irji' ilaihim falanaatiyan-nahum bijunoodil laa qibala lahum bihaa Wa-lanukhri-jannahum minhaaa azillatanw Wa-hum saaghiroon

words.translation: He said|O|chiefs!|Which of you|will bring me|her throne|before|that|they come to me|(in) submission

translations.1: Qaala yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aiyyukum yaateenee bi'arshihaa qabla aien yaatoonee muslimeen

words.translation: Said|a strong one|of|the jinn|I|will bring it to you|will bring it to you|before|[that]|you rise|from|your place|And indeed, I am|for it|surely, strong|trustworthy

translations.1: Qaala 'ifreetum minal jinni ana aateeka bihee qabla an taqooma mim maqaamika Wa-innee 'alaihi laqawiyyun ameen

words.translation: Said|one who|with him|(was) knowledge|of|the Scripture|I|will bring it to you|will bring it to you|before|[that]|returns|to you|your glance|Then when|he saw it|placed|before him|he said|This|(is) from|(the) Favor|(of) my Lord|to test me|whether I am grateful|or|I am ungrateful|And whoever|(is) grateful|then only|he is grateful|for his own soul|And whoever|(is) ungrateful|then indeed|my Lord|(is) Self-sufficient|Noble

translations.1: Qaalal lazee indahoo 'ilmum minal Kitaabi ana aateeka bihee qabla aien yartadda ilaika tarfuk; falammaa ra-aahu mustaqirran 'indahoo qaala haazaa min fadli Rabbee li-yabluwaneee 'a-ashkuru am akfuru Wa-man shakara fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-inna Rabbee Ghaniyyun Kareem

words.translation: He said|Disguise|for her|her throne|we will see|whether she will be guided|or|will be|of|those who|are not guided|are not guided

translations.1: Qaala nakkiroo lahaa 'arshahaa nanzur atahtadeee am takoonu minal lazeena laa yahtadoon

words.translation: So when|she came|it was said|Is like this|your throne|She said|It is like|it|And we were given|the knowledge|before her|before her|and we have been|Muslims

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'at qeela ahaakaza 'arshuki qaalat kaanna hoo; Wa-ooteenal 'ilma min qablihaa Wa-kunnaa muslimeen

words.translation: And has averted her|what|she used (to)|worship|besides|besides|Allah|Indeed, she|was|from|a people|who disbelieve

translations.1: Wa-saddahaa maa kaanat ta'budu min doonil laahi innahaa kaanat min qawmin kaafireen

words.translation: It was said|to her|Enter|the palace|Then when|she saw it|she thought it|(was) a pool|and she uncovered|[on]|her shins|He said|Indeed it|(is) a palace|made smooth|of|glass|She said|My Lord|indeed I|[I] have wronged|myself|and I submit|with|Sulaiman|to Allah|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra-at-hu hasibat-hu lujjatanw Wa-khashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee Wa-aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

words.translation: And certainly|We sent|to|Thamud|their brother|Salih|that|Worship|Allah|Then behold!|They|(became) two parties|quarreling

translations.1: Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihan ani'budul lahha fa-izaa hum fareeqaani yakhtasimoon

words.translation: He said|O my people!|Why|(do) you seek to hasten|the evil|before|the good|Why not|you ask forgiveness|(of) Allah|so that you may|receive mercy

translations.1: Qaala yaa-qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissaiyi'ati qablal hasanati law-laa tas-taghfiroonal laaha la'allakum turhamoon

words.translation: They said|We consider you a bad omen|We consider you a bad omen|and those|with you|He said|Your bad omen|(is) with|Allah|Nay|you|(are) a people|being tested

translations.1: Qaalut taiyyarnaa bika Wa-bimam ma'ak; qaala taaa'irukum 'indal laahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoon

words.translation: And were|in|the city|nine|family heads|they were spreading corruption|in|the land|and not|reforming

translations.1: Wa-kaana fil madeenati tis'atu rahtien yufsidoona fil ardi Wa-laa yuslihoon

words.translation: They said|Swear to each other|by Allah|surely we will attack him by night|and his family|Then|we will surely say|to his heir|Not|we witnessed|(the) destruction|(of) his family|and indeed we|(are) surely truthful."

translations.1: Qaaloo taqaasamoo billaahi lanubaiyyitannahoo Wa-ahlahoo summaa lanaqoolana liwaliy-yihee maa shahidnaa mahlika ahliee Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon

words.translation: So they plotted|a plot|and We planned|a plan|while they|(did) not|perceive

translations.1: Wa-makaroo makranw Wa-makarnaa makranw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.translation: Then see|how|was|(the) end|(of) their plot|that We|destroyed them|and their people|all

translations.1: Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatu makrihim annaa dammar-naahum Wa-qawmahum ajma'een

words.translation: So these|(are) their houses|ruined|because|they wronged|Indeed|in|that|surely is a sign|for a people|who know

translations.1: Fatilka buyootuhum khaa-wiyatam bimaa zalamoo; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqaw-mien ya'lamoon

words.translation: And We saved|those who|believed|and used (to)|fear (Allah)

translations.1: Wa-anjainal lazeena aamanoo Wa-kaanoo yattaqoon

words.translation: And Lut|when|he said|to his people|Do you commit|[the] immorality|while you|see

translations.1: Wa-lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ataatoonal faa-hishata Wa-antum tubsiroon

words.translation: Why do you|approach|the men|(with) lust|instead of|instead of|the women|Nay|you|(are) a people|ignorant

translations.1: A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum qawmun tajhaloon

words.translation: But not|was|(the) answer|(of) his people|except|that|they said|Drive out|(the) family|(of) Lut|from|your town|Indeed they|(are) people|who keep clean and pure

translations.1: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalooo akhrijooo aalaa Lootim min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon

words.translation: So We saved him|and his family|except|his wife|We destined her|(to be) of|those who remained behind

translations.1: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaahaa minal ghaabireen

words.translation: And We rained|upon them|a rain|and was evil|(the) rain|(on) those who were warned

translations.1: Wa-amtarnaa 'alaihimm mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen

words.translation: Say|All praise (be)|to Allah|and peace (be)|upon|His slaves|those whom|He has chosen|Is Allah|better|or what|they associate (with Him)

translations.1: Qulil hamdu lillaahi Wa-salaamun 'alaa 'ibaadihil lazeenas tafaa; aaallaahu khairun ammmaa yushrikoon

words.translation: Or Who|has created|the heavens|and the earth|and sent down|for you|from|the sky|water|And We caused to grow|thereby|gardens|of beauty (and delight)|of beauty (and delight)|not|it is|for you|that|you cause to grow|their trees|Is there any god|with|Allah|Nay|they|(are) a people|who ascribe equals

translations.1: Amman khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala lakum minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-anbatnaa bihee hadaaa'iqa zaata bahjah; maa kaana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa; 'a-ilaahun ma'al laah; bal hum qawmuien ya'diloon

words.translation: Or Who|made|the earth|a firm abode|and made|(in) its midst|rivers|and made|for it|firm mountains|and made|between|the two seas|a barrier|Is there any god|with|Allah|Nay|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Ammann ja'alal arda qaraaranw Wa-ja'ala khilaalahaaa anhaaranw Wa-ja'ala lahaa rawaasiya Wa-ja'ala bainal bahraini haajizaa; 'a-ilaahun ma' allah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

words.translation: Or Who|responds|(to) the distressed one|when|he calls Him|and He removes|the evil|and makes you|inheritors|(of) the earth|Is there any god|with|Allah|Little|(is) what|you remember

translations.1: Ammaien yujeebul mud-tarra izaa da'aahu Wa-yakshifus sooo'a Wa-yaj'alukum khula-faaa'al ardi 'a-ilaahun ma' allaah qaleelan maa tazak-karoon

words.translation: Or Who|guides you|in|(the) darkness[es]|(of) the land|and the sea|and Who|sends|the winds|(as) glad tidings|before|before|His Mercy|Is there any god|with|Allah|High is|Allah|above what|they associate (with Him)

translations.1: Ammaien yahdeekum fee zulumaatil barri wal bahri Wa-maien yursilu riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; Ta'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon

words.translation: Or Who|originates|the creation|then|repeats it|and Who|provides you|from|the heavens|and the earth|Is there any god|with|Allah|Say|Bring forth|your proof|if|you are|truthful

translations.1: Ammaien yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo Wa-maien yarzuqukum minas sammaaa'i wal ard; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; qul haatoo burhaanakum in kuntum saadiqeen

words.translation: Say|No (one)|knows|whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and the earth|(of) the unseen|except|Allah|and not|they perceive|when|they will be resurrected

translations.1: Qul laa ya'lamu man fis sammaawaati wal-ardil ghaiba illal laah; Wa-maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon

words.translation: Nay|is arrested|their knowledge|of|the Hereafter|Nay|they|(are) in|doubt|about it|Nay|they|about it|(are) blind

translations.1: Balid daaraka 'ilmuhum fil Aakhirah; bal hum fee shakkin minhaa bal hum minhaa 'amoon

words.translation: And say|those who|disbelieve|What when|we have become|dust|and our forefathers|will we|surely be brought out

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo 'a-izaa kunnaa turaabanw Wa-aabaaa'unaaa a'innaa lamukhrajoon

words.translation: Certainly|we have been promised|this|we|and our forefathers|before|before|Not|(is) this|except|tales|(of) the former (people)

translations.1: Laqad wu'idnaa haazaa nahnu Wa-aabaaa'unaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

words.translation: Say|Travel|in|the land|and see|how|was|(the) end|(of) the criminals

translations.1: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mujrimeen

words.translation: And (do) not|grieve|over them|and not|be|in|distress|from what|they plot

translations.1: Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim Wa-laa takun fee daiqin mimmaa yamkuroon

words.translation: And they say|When|(will) this|promise (be fulfilled)|if|you are|truthful

translations.1: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

words.translation: Say|Perhaps|that|is|close behind|you|some|(of) that which|you seek to hasten

translations.1: Qul 'asaaa aien yakoona radifa lakum ba'dul lazee tasta'jiloon

words.translation: And indeed|your Lord|(is) full of Bounty|(is) full of Bounty|for|the mankind|but|most of them|(are) not|grateful

translations.1: Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa yashkuroon

words.translation: And indeed|your Lord|surely knows|what|conceals|their breasts|and what|they declare

translations.1: Wa-inna Rabbaka la-ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon

words.translation: And not (is)|any (thing)|hidden|in|the heavens|and the earth|but|(is) in|a Record|clear

translations.1: Wa-maa min ghaaa'ibatin fis samaaa'i wal-ardi illaa fee kitaabin mubeen

words.translation: Indeed|this|[the] Quran|relates|to|(the) Children|(of) Israel|most|(of) that|they|in it|differ

translations.1: Inna haazal Qur-aana yaqussu 'alaa Baneee israaa'eela aksaral lazee hum feehi yakhtalifoon

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) surely a guidance|and a mercy|for the believers

translations.1: Wa-innahoo lahudanw Wa-rahmatul lilmu'mineen

words.translation: Indeed|your Lord|will judge|between them|by His Judgment|and He|(is) the All-Mighty|the All-Knower

translations.1: Inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum bihukmih; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

words.translation: So put your trust|in|Allah|indeed you|(are) on|the truth|manifest

translations.1: Fatawakkal 'alal laahi innaka 'alal haqqil mubeen

words.translation: Indeed you|(can)not|cause to hear|the dead|and not|can you cause to hear|the deaf|the call|when|they turn back|retreating

translations.1: Innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa izaa wallaw mudbireen

words.translation: And not|(can) you|guide|the blind|from|their error|Not|you can cause to hear|except|(those) who|believe|in Our Signs|so they|(are) Muslims

translations.1: Wa-maaa anta bihaadil-'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yu'minu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

words.translation: And when|(is) fulfilled|the word|against them|We will bring forth|for them|a creature|from|the earth|speaking to them|that|the people|were|of Our Signs|not|certain

translations.1: Wa-izaa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim akhrajnaa lahum daaabbatan minal ardi tukal-limuhum annan naasa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa laa yooqinoon

words.translation: And (the) Day|We will gather|from|every|nation|a troop|of (those) who|deny|Our Signs|and they|will be set in rows

translations.1: Wa-Yawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimmaien yukazzibu bi-Aayaatinaa fahum yooza'oon

words.translation: Until|when|they come|He will say|Did you deny|My Signs|while not|you encompassed|them|(in) knowledge|or what|you used (to)|do

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'oo qaala akazzabtum bi-Aayaatee Wa-lam tuheetoo bihaa 'ilman ammaazaa kuntum ta'maloon

words.translation: And (will be) fulfilled|the word|against them|because|they wronged|and they|(will) not|speak

translations.1: Wa-waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim bimaa zalamoo fahum laa yantiqoon

words.translation: Do not|they see|that We|[We] have made|the night|that they may rest|in it|and the day|giving visibility|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for a people|who believe

translations.1: Alam yaraw annaa ja'alnal laila li-yaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqaw-mien yu'minoon

words.translation: And (the) Day|will be blown|[in]|the trumpet|and will be terrified|whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and whoever|(is) in|the earth|except|whom|Allah wills|Allah wills|And all|(will) come to Him|humbled

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yunfakhu fis Soori fafazi'a man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaaa'al laah; Wa-kullun atawhu daakhireen

words.translation: And you see|the mountains|thinking them|firmly fixed|while they|will pass|(as the) passing|(of) the clouds|(The) Work|(of) Allah|Who|perfected|all|things|Indeed He|(is) All-Aware|of what|you do

translations.1: Wa-taral jibaala tahsabuhaa jaamidatanw Wa-hiya tamurru marras sahaab; sun'al laahil lazeee atqana kulla shai'; innahoo khabeerun bimaa taf'aloon

words.translation: Whoever|comes|with the good|then for him|(will be) better|than it|and they|from|(the) terror|(of) that Day|(will be) safe

translations.1: Man jaaa'a bil-hasanati falahoo khairun minhaa Wa-hum min faza'ien Yawma'izin aaminoon

words.translation: And whoever|comes|with the evil|will be cast down|their faces|in|the Fire|Are|you recompensed|except|(for) what|you used (to)|do

translations.1: Wa-man jaaa'a bissai-yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

words.translation: Only|I am commanded|that|I worship|(the) Lord|(of) this|city|the One Who|made it sacred|and to Him (belongs)|all|things|And I am commanded|that|I be|of|the Muslims

translations.1: Innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa Wa-lahoo kullu shai'inw Wa-umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

words.translation: And that|I recite|the Quran|And whoever|accepts guidance|then only|he accepts guidance|for himself|and whoever|goes astray|then say|Only|I am|of|the warners

translations.1: Wa-an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen

words.translation: And say|All praise (be)|to Allah|He will show you|His Signs|and you will recognize them|And your Lord is not|And your Lord is not|unaware|of what|you do

translations.1: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahi sa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ta'rifoonahaa; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon
